languages.text: "Полагаю, раз вы все еще не обнажили оружие, намерения у вас скорее мирные. А потому Дом Орселлио просит вас об услуге — спасение жизни Дитя в обмен на дальнейшее сотрудничество. Не спешите отвечать, подумайте. Чего вы хотите — обзавестись сегодня союзником или врагом".

traits.locale_text: "Полагаю, раз вы все еще не обнажили оружие, намерения у вас скорее мирные. А потому Дом Орселио просит вас об услуге — спасение жизни Дитя в обмен на дальнейшее сотрудничество. Не спешите отвечать, подумайте. Чего вы хотите — обзавестись сегодня союзником или врагом".

languages.text: "Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."
languages.original_text: "Полагаю, раз вы все еще не обнажили оружие, намерения у вас скорее мирные. А потому Дом Орселлио просит вас об услуге — спасение жизни Дитя в обмен на дальнейшее сотрудничество. Не спешите отвечать, подумайте. Чего вы хотите — обзавестись сегодня союзником или врагом".

traits.locale_text: "Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

"Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

"Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

"Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

languages.text: “鉴于你们到目前为止还没有拔出武器，或许你们确实出于和平的意图。因此，奥赛罗家族要求你帮我们一个忙。只要你们能拯救圣子的生命，我们今后就可以友好合作。不必急于答复，先考虑考虑吧。你可能会成为我们的家族的盟友，也可能会成为我们的敌人，这一切都由你来决定。”
languages.original_text: "Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

traits.locale_text: “鉴于你们到目前为止还没有拔出武器，或许你们确实出于和平的意图。因此，奥塞罗家族要求你帮我们一个忙。只要你们能拯救这个孩子的生命，我们今后就可以友好合作。不必急于答复，先考虑考虑吧。你可能会成为我们的家族的盟友，也可能会成为我们的敌人，这一切都由你来决定。”

languages.text: «Dado que todavía no ha desenfundado las armas, he de concluir que sus intenciones son pacíficas. Por tanto, la casa Orsellio ahora le solicita un servicio: salve la vida de la niña y cooperaremos más adelante. No se apresure a contestar; piénselo. Hoy puede convertirse en aliado o enemigo de nuestra casa. La decisión es suya».
languages.original_text: "Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

traits.locale_text: «Dado que todavía no ha desenfundado las armas, he de concluir que sus intenciones son pacíficas. Por tanto, la casa Orsellio ahora le solicita un servicio: salve la vida de la niña y cooperaremos más adelante. No se apresure a contestar; piénselo. Hoy puede convertirse en aliado o enemigo de nuestra casa. La decisión es suya».

languages.text: 「今のところ武器を抜いていないところを見ると、あなた方の意図はおそらく平和的なものなのだろう。そこでオーセリオ家は今、あなた方に奉仕を求めたい。今後の協力と引き換えに、『子ども』の命を救ってほしいのだ。返事を急がない。よく考えてほしい。今日、我が家の味方になるか、敵になるか、あなたが決めるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

traits.locale_text: 「今のところ武器を抜いていないところを見ると、あなた方の意図はおそらく平和的なものなのだろう。そこでオーセリオ家は今、あなた方に奉仕を求めたい。今後の協力と引き換えに、『子ども』の命を救ってほしいのだ。返事を急がない。よく考えてほしい。今日、我が家の味方になるか、敵になるか、あなたが決めるのだ」

languages.text: "Da Ihr Eure Waffen bisher noch nicht gezogen habt, sind Eure Absichten vermutlich friedlich. Und daher erbittet das Haus Orsellio nun einen Dienst von Euch — rettet das Leben des Kindes im Tausch gegen eine zukünftige Kooperation. Eilt Euch nicht mit Eurer Antwort, denkt darüber nach. Ihr könnt Euch heute {mf|zum Verbündeten oder zum Feind|zur Verbündeten oder zur Feindin} unseres Hauses machen — die Entscheidung liegt bei Euch."
languages.original_text: "Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

traits.locale_text: "Da Ihr Eure Waffen bisher noch nicht gezogen habt, sind Eure Absichten vermutlich friedlich. Und daher erbittet das Haus Orsellio nun einen Dienst von Euch — rettet das Leben des Kindes im Tausch gegen eine zukünftige Kooperation. Eilt Euch nicht mit Eurer Antwort, denkt darüber nach. Ihr könnt Euch heute {mf|zum Verbündeten oder zum Feind|zur Verbündeten oder zur Feindin} unseres Hauses machen — die Entscheidung liegt bei Euch."

languages.text: « Étant donné que vous n'avez pas encore dégainé vos armes, j'en conclus que vos intentions sont pacifiques. La maison Orsellio vous demande alors un service en échange de sa future coopération : sauver la vie de l'Enfant. Ne vous hâtez pas de répondre, prenez le temps d'y réfléchir. Vous avez en ce jour l'occasion de faire de la maison Orsellio une alliée ou une ennemie, la décision n'appartient qu'à vous. »
languages.original_text: "Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

traits.locale_text: « Étant donné que vous n'avez pas encore dégainé vos armes, j'en conclus que vos intentions sont pacifiques. La maison Orsellio vous demande alors un service en échange de sa future coopération : sauver la vie de l'Enfant. Ne vous hâtez pas de répondre, prenez le temps d'y réfléchir. Vous avez en ce jour l'occasion de faire de la maison Orsellio une alliée ou une ennemie, la décision n'appartient qu'à vous. »

languages.text: "Hâlen silahlarını çekmemiş olduğun düşünülürse niyetin muhtemelen barışçıl. Orsellio Hanesi, hizmetlerini rica ediyor: Potansiyel iş birliğimiz karşılığında Çocuk'un hayatını kurtar. Yanıt vermekte acele etme, iyice düşün. Bugün Hanemizin müttefiki veya düşmanı olabilirsin, karar sana ait."
languages.original_text: "Given that you have not so far drawn your weapons, your intentions are probably peaceful. And so House Orsellio now asks a service of you — save the life of the Child in exchange for future cooperation. Do not hurry to answer, think on it. You can make yourself an ally or an enemy of our House today — you decide."

traits.locale_text: "Hâlen silahlarını çekmemiş olduğun düşünülürse niyetin muhtemelen barışçıl. Orsellio Hanesi, hizmetlerini rica ediyor: Potansiyel iş birliğimiz karşılığında Çocuk'un hayatını kurtar. Yanıt vermekte acele etme, iyice düşün. Bugün Hanemizin müttefiki veya düşmanı olabilirsin, karar sana ait."
